verses.verse: And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> pit and a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G254>chain<s%> in his <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

And he laid <S%G2902>hold<s%> on the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> that <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G1228>Devil,<s%> and <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> him a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%>

And <S%G906>cast<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> pit, and <S%G2808>shut<s%> him up, and <S%G4972>set<s%> a <S%G4972>seal<s%> on him, that he should <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2089>more,<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> should be <S%G5055>fulfilled:<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> that he <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>season.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> and they <S%G2523>sat<s%> on them, and <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to them: and I saw the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of them that were <S%G3990>beheaded<s%> for the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and for the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G3748>which<s%> had not <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> his <S%G1504>image,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> had <S%G2983>received<s%> his <S%G5480>mark<s%> on their <S%G3359>foreheads,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> in their <S%G5495>hands;<s%> and they <S%G2198>lived<s%> and <S%G936>reigned<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

But the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G326>lived<s%> not <S%G326>again<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G5055>finished.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> and <S%G40>holy<s%> is he that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> in the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection:<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5130>such<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> but they shall be <S%G2409>priests<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and shall <S%G936>reign<s%> with him a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>
And <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> are <S%G5055>expired,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> shall be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> out of his <S%G5438>prison,<s%>

And shall <S%G1831>go<s%> out to <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>quarters<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1136>Gog,<s%> and <S%G3098>Magog,<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> them <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G4171>battle:<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> is as the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And they <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4114>breadth<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G2944>compassed<s%> the <S%G3925>camp<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2944>about,<s%> and the <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G4172>city:<s%> and <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2719>devoured<s%> them.

And the <S%G1228>devil<s%> that <S%G4105>deceived<s%> them was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet<s%> are, and shall be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> it, from <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> away; and there was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> for them.

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> and <S%G3173>great,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> and the <S%G975>books<s%> were <S%G455>opened:<s%> and <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G976>book<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life:<s%> and the <S%G3498>dead<s%> were <S%G2919>judged<s%> out of <S%G3588>those<s%> things which were <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G975>books,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>works.<s%>

And the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> up the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in it; and <S%G2288>death<s%> and <S%G86>hell<s%> <S%G1325>delivered<s%> up the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in them: and they were <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>works.<s%>
And <S%G2288>death<s%> and <S%G86>hell<s%> were <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

And <S%G1536>whoever<s%> was not <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
